mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NUM, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, COUNT, C.CATEGORY_NUM, NOTICE_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}

SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NUM, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, COUNT, C.CATEGORY_NUM, NOTICE_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}+1

SELECT NOTICE_NO, MEMBER_NUM, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, COUNT, C.CATEGORY_NUM, NOTICE_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}-1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
